title: [Western DragonSpine, Slope]
description: The ledge narrows here somewhat, but it is still passable.  A small flurry of dust, disturbed by passing footsteps, disappears into the mist below the ledge.  The mountainside is sharp and rigid with pointed rock protruding out and small, deep fissures leading into the mountain.
location: between Wehnimer's Landing and Zul Logoth
